title: GROWW | SDE 4  | Bengaluru
content:
Education: Tier-3
Years of Experience: 9 years 2 months
Current Experience: SDE 3 at E-Commerce
Current salary: 70 LPA (45 LPA base , 7 bonus,17 LPA Esops)
Date of the Offer: September
Company: GROWW
Title/Level: SDE 4
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 63 LPA base , 7L performance linked variable
Stock bonus: 14 lakhs per year ( 56 LPA over 4)
Joining Bonus: 2 lakhs
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 84LPA first year (inlucding variable excluding Joining bonus)

Negotiated with HR 1st offer was  with NO CTC change , 2nd offer was with 10 % increment and the final offer is the above mentioned with 20 % hike.

Should I Reject the offer, less than 25% hike ? 

I applied for EM Role , but they down level to SDE 4 as no prior people management experience

Interview experience :
Groww had 4 tech rounds + 1 HR round and all rounds went well, still no room for negotiation. 

R1 : DSA - I do not remember the question but it was Leetcode hard level
R2: LLD - Stock Excahnge
R3: HLD - stocks candle chart design
R4: HM - basic details about current role and project and some scenario based questions

LLD round was 2 hours - rest all 1 hr.
salaryTotal: : 84lpa First Year (inlucding Variable Excluding Joining Bonus)
